FuncDef: This command defines an external collector node that will collect IPFIX records sent by 7750 SR node. The IPFIX records will be streamed to the collector node using UDP transport. Traffic is originated from a random ephemeral UDP port to the destination port 4739. Up to two collector nodes can be defined for redundancy purposes.

ParaDef.Info: Router instance from which the collector node is reachable.
IPv4 address of the external collector node to which IPFIX records will be sent.
Keyword used to create the collector instance.
